Label: Study Design Type
Description: A term allowing the classification of the study based on the overall experimental design, e.g cross-over design or parallel group design. The term can be free text or from, for example, a controlled vocabulary or an ontology. If the latter source is used the Term Accession Number and Term Source REF fields below are required.

Label: Study Design Type Term Accession Number
Description: The accession number from the Term Source associated with the selected term.

Label: Study Design Type Term Source REF
Description: Identifies the controlled vocabulary or ontology that this term comes from. The Study Design Term Source REF has to match one the Term Source Name declared in the Ontology Source Reference section.
